item.title: Space Giraffes Ate My Crewmate
item.description: Short Pitch: When a routine mission to the International Space Station turns deadly, astronaut Commander Alex Mason returns to Earth with a bizarre tale of extraterrestrial murder. Haunted by the gruesome death of his partner and the horrifying sight of the Space Giraffes responsible, Mason embarks on a desperate quest to warn the world of the leafy green-loving menace lurking beyond the stars. But as his sanity unravels and the evidence mounts against him, Mason must confront a chilling truth: the real danger might not be in outer space, but within himself.
